name: Create Task Branch
description: Create a new branch from default branch before implementing tasks from tasks.md

action.message:
Please check .kiro/specs/phase-1/tasks.md and tell me which task number to implement. I will create a new branch from the default branch (main).

Steps:
1. Select task to implement from tasks.md
2. Tell me the task number (e.g., 1.1)
3. Switch to default branch and pull latest
4. Create new branch (e.g., feat/task-1.1-setup-hono-app)
5. Start task implementation
